docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, July 27. -- Since a large Conservative majority in the House of Commons is seen to be assured there is a resurgence of jingoism in the press and from the platform. This condition of affairs heralds a stormy time if Prime Minister Salisbury should seek to satisfy the aspirations of his followers.

headline.main: EUROPEAN NEWS GOSSIP; Conservative Victory a Peril to Peace -- Jingoism and Salisbury. PROMPTINGS OF THE NEWSPAPERS Bearish Cotton Crop Report -- Shipping Firms' Interests -- Wilde's Occupations -- Drop in Consols.

docs.abstract: Conservatives' Majority; Press's Jingoism as Result
